ğ”¼mâ€‹[ğ’¬T(m)]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{m}\left[{\mathcal{Q}}_{T}^{(m)}\right]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] =âˆ‘tâˆˆğ’a(m)âˆ–ğ’a(0)ğ”¼mâ€‹[logâ¡â„™(a)â€‹(st,1,â‹¯,st,H)â„™(b)â€‹(st,1,â‹¯,st,H)]\displaystyle=\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a}^{(m)}\setminus{\mathcal{C}}_{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a}^{(0)}}\mathbb{E}_{m}\left[\log\frac{{\mathbb{P}}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s_{t,1},\cdots,s_{t,H})}{{\mathbb{P}}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}(s_{t,1},\cdots,s_{t,H})}\right]= âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_a end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ– caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_a end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log divide start_ARG blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â‹¯ , italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â‹¯ , italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ]
=âˆ‘tâˆˆğ’a(m)âˆ–ğ’a(0)ğ”¼mâ€‹[logâ¡Î¼(a)â€‹(st,1)Î¼(b)â€‹(st,1)+âˆ‘h=1Hâˆ’1logâ¡p(a)â€‹(st,h+1|st,h)p(b)â€‹(st,h+1|st,h)]\displaystyle=\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a}^{(m)}\setminus{\mathcal{C}}_{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a}^{(0)}}\mathbb{E}_{m}\left[\log\frac{\mu^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s_{t,1})}{\mu^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}(s_{t,1})}+\sum_{h=1}^{H-1}\log\frac{p^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s_{t,h+1}|s_{t,h})}{p^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}(s_{t,h+1}|s_{t,h})}\right]= âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_a end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ– caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_a end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG + âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ]
=2c[ğ–ªğ–«(Î¼(a),Î¼(b))+âˆ‘h=1Hâˆ’1âˆ‘sâˆˆğ’®â„™(a)(st,h=s)ğ–ªğ–«(p(a)(â‹…|s),p(b)(â‹…|s))]\displaystyle=2c\left[\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(\mu^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})},\mu^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}\right)+\sum_{h=1}^{H-1}\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}{\mathbb{P}}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s_{t,h}=s)\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(p^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(\cdot|s),p^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}(\cdot|s)\right)\right]= 2 italic_c [ sansserif_KL ( italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_s ) sansserif_KL ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) ) ] (Law of total expectation w.r.t. st,hs_{t,h}italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT)
=2â€‹(Hâˆ’1)â€‹câ€‹[1Hâˆ’1ğ–ªğ–«(Î¼(a),Î¼(b))+âˆ‘sâˆˆğ’®â„™H(a)(s)ğ–ªğ–«(p(a)(â‹…|s),p(b)(â‹…|s))]âŸ=â£:ğ’Ÿ(a,b).\displaystyle=2(H-1)c\underbrace{\left[\frac{1}{H-1}\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(\mu^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})},\mu^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}\right)+\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}{\mathbb{P}}_{H}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s)\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(p^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(\cdot|s),p^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}(\cdot|s)\right)\right]}_{=\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}{\mathcal{D}}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a},{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}}.= 2 ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_c underâŸ start_ARG [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H - 1 end_ARG sansserif_KL ( italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) sansserif_KL ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) ) ] end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT = : caligraphic_D start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a , italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . (â„™H(a)(s):=1Hâˆ’1âˆ‘h=1Hâˆ’1â„™(a)(st,h=s){\mathbb{P}}_{H}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\frac{1}{H-1}\sum_{h=1}^{H-1}{\mathbb{P}}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a})}(s_{t,h}=s)blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) : = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H - 1 end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_s ))

There are two paths from here, one inspired by the arguments of Jedra and ProutiÃ¨re [2023] that utilizes data processing inequality, and another inspired by Yun and ProutiÃ¨re [2019] that utilizes Markovâ€™s inequality. The former leads to the non-asymptotic guarantee, while the latter leads to the asymptotic guarantee.

Non-asymptotic guarantee. We recall the likelihood version of the data processing inequality777This has been referred to as the â€œFundamental Inequalityâ€ in Garivier etÂ al. [2019], as using this allows for a strikingly simple proof of distribution-dependent bandit regret lower bounds.:

Lemma A.2 (Data Processing Inequality; Lemma 1 of Garivier etÂ al. [2019]).

Consider a measurable space (Î“,ğ’¢)(\Gamma,{\mathcal{G}})( roman_Î“ , caligraphic_G ) equipped with two probability measure â„™1{\mathbb{P}}_{1}blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and â„™2{\mathbb{P}}_{2}blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Then, we have that

ğ–ªğ–«â¡(â„™1,â„™2)â‰¥supZğ—„ğ—…â€‹(ğ”¼1â€‹[Z],ğ”¼2â€‹[Z]),\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}({\mathbb{P}}_{1},{\mathbb{P}}_{2})\geq\sup_{Z}{\mathsf{kl}}(\mathbb{E}_{1}[Z],\mathbb{E}_{2}[Z]),sansserif_KL ( blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¥ roman_sup start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_kl ( blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_Z ] , blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_Z ] ) , (18)

where supZ\sup_{Z}roman_sup start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is over all possible ğ’¢{\mathcal{G}}caligraphic_G-measurable random variable Z:Î©â†’[0,1]Z\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}\Omega\rightarrow[0,1]italic_Z : roman_Î© â†’ [ 0 , 1 ] and ğ—„ğ—…{\mathsf{kl}}sansserif_kl is the Bernoulli KL divergence, i.e., ğ—„ğ—…(p,q):=plogpq+(1âˆ’p)log1âˆ’p1âˆ’q{\mathsf{kl}}(p,q)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=p\log\frac{p}{q}+(1-p)\log\frac{1-p}{1-q}sansserif_kl ( italic_p , italic_q ) : = italic_p roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_ARG italic_q end_ARG + ( 1 - italic_p ) roman_log divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_q end_ARG for p,qâˆˆ(0,1)p,q\in(0,1)italic_p , italic_q âˆˆ ( 0 , 1 ).

In the above lemma, let (Î“,ğ’¢)(\Gamma,{\mathcal{G}})( roman_Î“ , caligraphic_G ) be our observation space of TTitalic_T trajectories, â„™1=â„™m{\mathbb{P}}_{1}={\mathbb{P}}_{m}blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, â„™2=â„™0{\mathbb{P}}_{2}={\mathbb{P}}_{0}blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and Z=ğŸ™â€‹{â„°(m)}Z=\mathds{1}\{{\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}\}italic_Z = blackboard_1 { caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT }.

Then, we have that

2â€‹(Hâˆ’1)â€‹câ€‹ğ’Ÿ(a,b)\displaystyle 2(H-1)c{\mathcal{D}}^{({\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a},{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b})}2 ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_c caligraphic_D start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_a , italic_b ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =1MTâ€‹âˆ‘mâˆˆ[MT]ğ–ªğ–«â¡(â„™m,â„™0)\displaystyle=\frac{1}{M_{T}}\sum_{m\in[M_{T}]}\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left({\mathbb{P}}_{m},{\mathbb{P}}_{0}\right)= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_KL ( blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
â‰¥1MTâ€‹âˆ‘mâˆˆ[MT]ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(â„™mâ€‹(â„°(m)),â„™0â€‹(â„°(m)))\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{M_{T}}\sum_{m\in[M_{T}]}{\mathsf{kl}}\left({\mathbb{P}}_{m}({\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}),{\mathbb{P}}_{0}({\mathcal{E}}^{(m)})\right)â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_kl ( blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) , blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) (LemmaÂ A.2)
â‰¥ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(1MTâ€‹âˆ‘mâˆˆ[MT]â„™mâ€‹(â„°(m)),1MTâ€‹âˆ‘mâˆˆ[MT]â„™0â€‹(â„°(m)))\displaystyle\geq{\mathsf{kl}}\left(\frac{1}{M_{T}}\sum_{m\in[M_{T}]}{\mathbb{P}}_{m}({\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}),\frac{1}{M_{T}}\sum_{m\in[M_{T}]}{\mathbb{P}}_{0}\left({\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}\right)\right)â‰¥ sansserif_kl ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) (joint convexity of ğ—„ğ—…{\mathsf{kl}}sansserif_kl)
=ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(1MTâ€‹âˆ‘mâˆˆ[MT]â„™mâ€‹(â„°(m)),1MTâ€‹â„™0â€‹(â‹ƒmâˆˆ[MT]â„°(m)))\displaystyle={\mathsf{kl}}\left(\frac{1}{M_{T}}\sum_{m\in[M_{T}]}{\mathbb{P}}_{m}({\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}),\frac{1}{M_{T}}{\mathbb{P}}_{0}\left(\bigcup_{m\in[M_{T}]}{\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}\right)\right)= sansserif_kl ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( â‹ƒ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) (â„°(m){\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPTâ€™s are disjoint)
â‰¥(âˆ—)â€‹ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(1âˆ’Î´,Î´MT)\displaystyle\overset{(*)}{\geq}{\mathsf{kl}}\left(1-\delta,\frac{\delta}{M_{T}}\right)start_OVERACCENT ( âˆ— ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG â‰¥ end_ARG sansserif_kl ( 1 - italic_Î´ , divide start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG )
â‰¥(âˆ—âˆ—)â€‹(1âˆ’Î´)â€‹logâ¡MTÎ´âˆ’logâ¡2\displaystyle\overset{(**)}{\geq}(1-\delta)\log\frac{M_{T}}{\delta}-\log 2start_OVERACCENT ( âˆ— âˆ— ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG â‰¥ end_ARG ( 1 - italic_Î´ ) roman_log divide start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG - roman_log 2
â‰¥12â€‹logâ¡1Î´+c2â€‹logâ¡Î±bâ€‹T16â€‹eâ€‹câˆ’12â€‹logâ¡2\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\log\frac{1}{\delta}+\frac{c}{2}\log\frac{\alpha_{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b}T}{16ec}-\frac{1}{2}\log 2â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_Î± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_b end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG 16 italic_e italic_c end_ARG - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_log 2 (LemmaÂ A.1, Î´âˆˆ(0,1/2]\delta\in(0,1/2]italic_Î´ âˆˆ ( 0 , 1 / 2 ])
â‰¥12â€‹logâ¡12â€‹Î´+c2â€‹logâ¡Î±minâ€‹T16â€‹eâ€‹c.\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\log\frac{1}{2\delta}+\frac{c}{2}\log\frac{\alpha_{\min}T}{16ec}.â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_Î´ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_Î± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG 16 italic_e italic_c end_ARG .

(âˆ—)(*)( âˆ— ) follows from â„™mâ€‹(â„°(m))â‰¥1âˆ’Î´{\mathbb{P}}_{m}({\mathcal{E}}^{(m)})\geq 1-\deltablackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) â‰¥ 1 - italic_Î´ (as the algorithm is (Îµ,Î²,Î´)(\varepsilon,\beta,\delta)( italic_Îµ , italic_Î² , italic_Î´ )-stable), Eqn.Â (15), and the following well-known properties of ğ—„ğ—…{\mathsf{kl}}sansserif_kl:

  • â€¢

    qâ†¦ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(p,q)q\mapsto{\mathsf{kl}}(p,q)italic_q â†¦ sansserif_kl ( italic_p , italic_q ) is increasing in [p,1][p,1][ italic_p , 1 ], as

    âˆ‚qğ—„ğ—…â€‹(p,q)=âˆ’pq+1âˆ’p1âˆ’q=qâˆ’pqâ€‹(1âˆ’q)â‰¥0,\partial_{q}{\mathsf{kl}}(p,q)=-\frac{p}{q}+\frac{1-p}{1-q}=\frac{q-p}{q(1-q)}\geq 0,âˆ‚ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_q end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_kl ( italic_p , italic_q ) = - divide start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_ARG italic_q end_ARG + divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_q end_ARG = divide start_ARG italic_q - italic_p end_ARG start_ARG italic_q ( 1 - italic_q ) end_ARG â‰¥ 0 ,
  • â€¢

    pâ†¦ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(p,q)p\mapsto{\mathsf{kl}}(p,q)italic_p â†¦ sansserif_kl ( italic_p , italic_q ) is increasing on pâˆˆ[1/2,1]p\in[1/2,1]italic_p âˆˆ [ 1 / 2 , 1 ] when q<1/2q<1/2italic_q < 1 / 2, as

    âˆ‚pğ—„ğ—…â€‹(p,q)=logâ¡pqâˆ’logâ¡1âˆ’p1âˆ’q=logâ¡p1âˆ’p+1âˆ’qqâ‰¥0.\partial_{p}{\mathsf{kl}}(p,q)=\log\frac{p}{q}-\log\frac{1-p}{1-q}=\log\frac{p}{1-p}+\frac{1-q}{q}\geq 0.âˆ‚ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_kl ( italic_p , italic_q ) = roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_ARG italic_q end_ARG - roman_log divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_q end_ARG = roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_p end_ARG + divide start_ARG 1 - italic_q end_ARG start_ARG italic_q end_ARG â‰¥ 0 .

(âˆ—âˆ—)(**)( âˆ— âˆ— ) follows from ğ—„ğ—…â€‹(p,q)â‰¥pâ€‹logâ¡1qâˆ’logâ¡2{\mathsf{kl}}(p,q)\geq p\log\frac{1}{q}-\log 2sansserif_kl ( italic_p , italic_q ) â‰¥ italic_p roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_q end_ARG - roman_log 2 (Eqn. (11) of Garivier etÂ al. [2019]).

We conclude by rearranging the resulting inequality in terms of Î´\deltaitalic_Î´ and optimizing over aâ‰ bâˆˆ[K]{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}a}\neq{\color[rgb]{0,0,1}\definecolor[named]{pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0,0,1}b}\in[K]italic_a â‰  italic_b âˆˆ [ italic_K ].

âˆ(for non-asymptotic)

Asymptotic guarantee. Let mâˆ—=argâ€‹minmâˆˆ[MT]â¡â„™0â€‹[â„°(m)]m^{*}=\operatorname*{arg\,min}_{m\in[M_{T}]}{\mathbb{P}}_{0}[{\mathcal{E}}^{(m)}]italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = start_OPERATOR roman_arg roman_min end_OPERATOR start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m âˆˆ [ italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ]. Then,

â„™mâˆ—â€‹[ğ’¬T(mâˆ—)â‰¤logâ¡MT]\displaystyle{\mathbb{P}}_{m^{*}}[{\mathcal{Q}}_{T}^{(m^{*})}\leq\log M_{T}]blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ roman_log italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] =â„™mâˆ—â€‹[ğ’¬T(mâˆ—)â‰¤logâ¡MT,â„°(mâˆ—)]+â„™mâˆ—â€‹[ğ’¬T(mâˆ—)â‰¤logâ¡MT,(â„°(mâˆ—))âˆ]\displaystyle={\mathbb{P}}_{m^{*}}\left[{\mathcal{Q}}_{T}^{(m^{*})}\leq\log M_{T},{\mathcal{E}}^{(m^{*})}\right]+{\mathbb{P}}_{m^{*}}\left[{\mathcal{Q}}_{T}^{(m^{*})}\leq\log M_{T},({\mathcal{E}}^{(m^{*})})^{\complement}\right]= blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ roman_log italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] + blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ roman_log italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ]
â‰¤expâ¡(logâ¡MT)â€‹â„™0â€‹[ğ’¬T(mâˆ—)â‰¤logâ¡MT,â„°(mâˆ—)]+â„™mâˆ—â€‹[(â„°(mâˆ—))âˆ]\displaystyle\leq\exp(\log M_{T}){\mathbb{P}}_{0}\left[{\mathcal{Q}}_{T}^{(m^{*})}\leq\log M_{T},{\mathcal{E}}^{(m^{*})}\right]+{\mathbb{P}}_{m^{*}}\left[({\mathcal{E}}^{(m^{*})})^{\complement}\right]â‰¤ roman_exp ( roman_log italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ roman_log italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] + blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] (change of measure from the alternate model mâˆ—m^{*}italic_m start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT to the true model)

âˆ(for asymptotic)

Proof of PropositionÂ A.1.

Positivity and symmetricity are trivial. Thus, it remains to show the triangle inequality. Let f,g,hâˆˆâ„±â€‹(T,K)f,g,h\in{\mathcal{F}}(T,K)italic_f , italic_g , italic_h âˆˆ caligraphic_F ( italic_T , italic_K ). Then,

ETâ€‹(f,h)\displaystyle E_{T}(f,h)italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_f , italic_h ) =minÏƒâˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T]ğŸ™â€‹[fâ€‹(t)â‰ Ïƒâ€‹(hâ€‹(t))]\displaystyle=\min_{\sigma\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathds{1}[f(t)\neq\sigma(h(t))]= roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ïƒ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_f ( italic_t ) â‰  italic_Ïƒ ( italic_h ( italic_t ) ) ]
â‰¤minÎ½âˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â¡minÏƒâˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T]ğŸ™â€‹[fâ€‹(t)â‰ Î½â€‹(gâ€‹(t))âˆ¨Î½â€‹(gâ€‹(t))â‰ Ïƒâ€‹(hâ€‹(t))]\displaystyle\leq\min_{\nu\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\min_{\sigma\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathds{1}[f(t)\neq\nu(g(t))\vee\nu(g(t))\neq\sigma(h(t))]â‰¤ roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ïƒ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_f ( italic_t ) â‰  italic_Î½ ( italic_g ( italic_t ) ) âˆ¨ italic_Î½ ( italic_g ( italic_t ) ) â‰  italic_Ïƒ ( italic_h ( italic_t ) ) ]
â‰¤minÎ½âˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â¡minÏƒâˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T](ğŸ™â€‹[fâ€‹(t)â‰ Î½â€‹(gâ€‹(t))]+ğŸ™â€‹[Î½â€‹(gâ€‹(t))â‰ Ïƒâ€‹(hâ€‹(t))])\displaystyle\leq\min_{\nu\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\min_{\sigma\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\sum_{t\in[T]}\left(\mathds{1}[f(t)\neq\nu(g(t))]+\mathds{1}[\nu(g(t))\neq\sigma(h(t))]\right)â‰¤ roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ïƒ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( blackboard_1 [ italic_f ( italic_t ) â‰  italic_Î½ ( italic_g ( italic_t ) ) ] + blackboard_1 [ italic_Î½ ( italic_g ( italic_t ) ) â‰  italic_Ïƒ ( italic_h ( italic_t ) ) ] )
â‰¤minÎ½âˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T]ğŸ™â€‹[fâ€‹(t)â‰ Î½â€‹(gâ€‹(t))]+minÎ½âˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â¡minÏƒâˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T]ğŸ™â€‹[Î½â€‹(gâ€‹(t))â‰ Ïƒâ€‹(hâ€‹(t))]\displaystyle\leq\min_{\nu\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathds{1}[f(t)\neq\nu(g(t))]+\min_{\nu\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\min_{\sigma\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathds{1}[\nu(g(t))\neq\sigma(h(t))]â‰¤ roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_f ( italic_t ) â‰  italic_Î½ ( italic_g ( italic_t ) ) ] + roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ïƒ âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_Î½ ( italic_g ( italic_t ) ) â‰  italic_Ïƒ ( italic_h ( italic_t ) ) ]
=ETâ€‹(f,g)+minÎ½â€²âˆˆSymâ€‹(K)â¡ğŸ™â€‹[gâ€‹(t)â‰ Î½â€²â€‹(hâ€‹(t))]\displaystyle=E_{T}(f,g)+\min_{\nu^{\prime}\in\mathrm{Sym}(K)}\mathds{1}[g(t)\neq\nu^{\prime}(h(t))]= italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_f , italic_g ) + roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆˆ roman_Sym ( italic_K ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_g ( italic_t ) â‰  italic_Î½ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h ( italic_t ) ) ] (Î½â€²=Î½âˆ’1âˆ˜Ïƒ\nu^{\prime}=\nu^{-1}\circ\sigmaitalic_Î½ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_Î½ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ˜ italic_Ïƒ)
=ETâ€‹(f,g)+ETâ€‹(g,h).\displaystyle=E_{T}(f,g)+E_{T}(g,h).= italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_f , italic_g ) + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_g , italic_h ) .

âˆ

Appendix B Proof of TheoremÂ 4.1 â€“ Initial Spectral Clustering

We remark in advance that the proofs of all supporting lemmas and propositions are deferred to the end of this section.

We begin by establishing the following concentration result for ğ‘¾^\widehat{{\bm{W}}}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG:

Lemma B.1 (Concentration of ğ‘¾^\widehat{{\bm{W}}}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG to ğ‘¾{\bm{W}}bold_italic_W).

Let Î´âˆˆ(0,1)\delta\in(0,1)italic_Î´ âˆˆ ( 0 , 1 ). For each sâˆˆğ’®s\in{\mathcal{S}}italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S and tâˆˆ[T]t\in[T]italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ], the following holds with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1-\delta1 - italic_Î´, given that Hâ‰¥(251âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ¨52)â€‹2Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2H\geq\left(\frac{25}{1-\pi(s)}\vee 52\right)\frac{2}{\pi(s)\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}italic_H â‰¥ ( divide start_ARG 25 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¨ 52 ) divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG:

âˆ¥Ï€(fâ€‹(t))â€‹(s)p(fâ€‹(t))(â‹…|s)âˆ’1Hâ€‹N^tâ€‹(s)N^t(s,â‹…)âˆ¥2â‰¤42Hâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)+1)Ï€minâ€‹Î´2.\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(f(t))}(s)}p^{(f(t))}(\cdot|s)-\frac{1}{\sqrt{H\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,\cdot)\right\rVert_{2}\leq 4\sqrt{\frac{2}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8(H\pi(s)+1)}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}.âˆ¥ square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_H over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , â‹… ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¤ 4 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG . (20)

If we additionally assume that Hâ‰¥9â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)Ï€minH\geq\frac{9\pi(s)}{\pi_{\min}}italic_H â‰¥ divide start_ARG 9 italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG, the following holds with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1-\delta1 - italic_Î´:

|(ğ‘¾)t,:âˆ’(ğ‘¾^)t,:|â‰¤r^â‰œ8â€‹SHâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡HÎ´âŸ¹â€–ğ‘¾âˆ’ğ‘¾^â€–2â†’âˆâ‰¤8â€‹SHâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´.\left|({\bm{W}})_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}-(\widehat{{\bm{W}}})_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}\right|\leq\widehat{r}\triangleq 8\sqrt{\frac{S}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{H}{\delta}}\Longrightarrow\left\lVert{\bm{W}}-\widehat{{\bm{W}}}\right\rVert_{2\rightarrow\infty}\leq 8\sqrt{\frac{S}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}}.| ( bold_italic_W ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | â‰¤ over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG â‰œ 8 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG âŸ¹ âˆ¥ bold_italic_W - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 â†’ âˆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¤ 8 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG . (21)

First, as â€–ğ‘¾âˆ’ğ‘¾^â€–2â‰¤Tâ€‹â€–ğ‘¾âˆ’ğ‘¾^â€–2â†’âˆ\left\lVert{\bm{W}}-\widehat{{\bm{W}}}\right\rVert_{2}\leq\sqrt{T}\left\lVert{\bm{W}}-\widehat{{\bm{W}}}\right\rVert_{2\rightarrow\infty}âˆ¥ bold_italic_W - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¤ square-root start_ARG italic_T end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_W - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 â†’ âˆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPTÂ [Cape etÂ al., 2019, Proposition 6.3], with our choice of Ïƒ^thres:=8Tâ€‹SHâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´\widehat{\sigma}_{\mathrm{thres}}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=8\sqrt{\frac{TS}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}}over^ start_ARG italic_Ïƒ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_thres end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = 8 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_T italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG (line 3), we have from LemmaÂ B.1 and Weylâ€™s inequality for singular valuesÂ [Horn and Johnson, 2012, Problem 7.3.P16] that â„™â€‹(R^â‰¤R=rankâ€‹(ğ‘¾))â‰¥1âˆ’Î´{\mathbb{P}}\left(\widehat{R}\leq R=\mathrm{rank}({\bm{W}})\right)\geq 1-\deltablackboard_P ( over^ start_ARG italic_R end_ARG â‰¤ italic_R = roman_rank ( bold_italic_W ) ) â‰¥ 1 - italic_Î´. We will condition on this event throughout the remainder of the proof.

Then, we have that

â€–ğ‘¿^â€‹ğ‘½^1:RâŠ¤âˆ’ğ‘¾â€–F2\displaystyle\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{X}}}\widehat{{\bm{V}}}_{1\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}R}^{\top}-{\bm{W}}\right\rVert_{F}^{2}âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_X end_ARG over^ start_ARG bold_italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_R end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŠ¤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - bold_italic_W âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤2â€‹Râ€‹â€–ğ‘¿^â€‹ğ‘½^1:RâŠ¤âˆ’ğ‘¾â€–22\displaystyle\leq 2R\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{X}}}\widehat{{\bm{V}}}_{1\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}R}^{\top}-{\bm{W}}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}â‰¤ 2 italic_R âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_X end_ARG over^ start_ARG bold_italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_R end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŠ¤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - bold_italic_W âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
â‰¤4â€‹Râ€‹(â€–ğ‘¿^â€‹ğ‘½^1:RâŠ¤âˆ’ğ‘¾^â€–22+â€–ğ‘¾^âˆ’ğ‘¾â€–22)\displaystyle\leq 4R\left(\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{X}}}\widehat{{\bm{V}}}_{1\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}R}^{\top}-\widehat{{\bm{W}}}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}+\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{W}}}-{\bm{W}}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}\right)â‰¤ 4 italic_R ( âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_X end_ARG over^ start_ARG bold_italic_V end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 : italic_R end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŠ¤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_W end_ARG - bold_italic_W âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

=29â€‹Râ€‹Tâ€‹SHâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´.\displaystyle=2^{9}R\frac{TS}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}.= 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 9 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_R divide start_ARG italic_T italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG .

We now have the following lemma:

Lemma B.2.

If tâˆˆ[T]t\in[T]italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] is misclassified from AlgorithmÂ 1, then â€–ğ˜^t,:âˆ’ğ–t,:â€–2â‰¥Î”ğ–4\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{Y}}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}-{\bm{W}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}\right\rVert_{2}\geq\frac{\Delta_{\bm{W}}}{4}âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_Y end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¥ divide start_ARG roman_Î” start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG.

Then, we have that with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1-\delta1 - italic_Î´,

âˆ

B.1 Proof of LemmaÂ B.1

Note that

âˆ¥Ï€(fâ€‹(t))â€‹(s)p(fâ€‹(t))(â‹…|s)âˆ’1Hâ€‹N^tâ€‹(s)N^t(s,â‹…)âˆ¥2\displaystyle\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(f(t))}(s)}p^{(f(t))}(\cdot|s)-\frac{1}{\sqrt{H\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,\cdot)\right\rVert_{2}âˆ¥ square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_H over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , â‹… ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
â‰¤Ï€(fâ€‹(t))â€‹(s)â€‹âˆ¥p(fâ€‹(t))(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^tâ€‹(s,â‹…)N^tâ€‹(s)âˆ¥2âŸ(i)+|Ï€(fâ€‹(t))â€‹(s)âˆ’N^tâ€‹(s)H|âŸ(iâ€‹i)â€‹â€–N^tâ€‹(s,â‹…)N^tâ€‹(s)â€–2\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{\pi^{(f(t))}(s)}\underbrace{\left\lVert p^{(f(t))}(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}_{t}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}}_{(i)}+\underbrace{\left|\sqrt{\pi^{(f(t))}(s)}-\sqrt{\frac{\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}{H}}\right|}_{(ii)}\left\lVert\frac{\widehat{N}_{t}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}â‰¤ square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG underâŸ start_ARG âˆ¥ italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + underâŸ start_ARG | square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG end_ARG | end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i italic_i ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

Let us bound (i)(i)( italic_i ) and (iâ€‹i)(ii)( italic_i italic_i ) separately. For simplicity, we omit the dependency on tâˆˆ[T]t\in[T]italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ].

Bounding (i)(i)( italic_i ). Here, we follow the proof strategy of Wolfer and Kontorovich [2021, Theorem 3.1], with two crucial modifications: the quantity being bounded is the â„“2\ell_{2}roman_â„“ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-norm (not â„“1\ell_{1}roman_â„“ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-norm) error, and we only need to bound the error stemming from a single state ssitalic_s.

Let nsâˆˆâ„•n_{s}\in{\mathbb{N}}italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆˆ blackboard_N to be determined later, and let â„™Ï€{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the probability measure induced when the Markov chain starts from its stationary distribution. Then,

â„™Ï€(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>Îµ)\displaystyle{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\varepsilon\right)blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_Îµ )
â‰¤âˆ‘n=ns3â€‹nsâ„™Ï€(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>Îµ,N^(s)=ns)+â„™Ï€(N^(s)âˆ‰âŸ¦ns,3nsâŸ§).\displaystyle\leq\sum_{n=n_{s}}^{3n_{s}}{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\varepsilon,\ \widehat{N}(s)=n_{s}\right)+{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\widehat{N}(s)\not\in\llbracket n_{s},3n_{s}\rrbracket\right).â‰¤ âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_Îµ , over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) âˆ‰ âŸ¦ italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , 3 italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âŸ§ ) .

For the first term, we utilize the scheme of reducing learning the Markovian transition kernel to learning a discrete distribution, as described in the proof of Billingsley [1961, Theorem 3.1]. Then, denoting p^n(â‹…|s)\widehat{p}_{n}(\cdot|s)over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) to be the estimate of p(â‹…|s)p(\cdot|s)italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) from nnitalic_n i.i.d. samples of p(â‹…|s)p(\cdot|s)italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ), we have that

âˆ‘n=ns3â€‹nsâ„™Ï€(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>Îµ,N^(s)=n)\displaystyle\sum_{n=n_{s}}^{3n_{s}}{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\varepsilon,\ \widehat{N}(s)=n\right)âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_Îµ , over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) = italic_n ) â‰¤âˆ‘n=ns3â€‹nsâ„™Ï€(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’p^n(â‹…|s)âˆ¥2>Îµ)\displaystyle\leq\sum_{n=n_{s}}^{3n_{s}}{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\widehat{p}_{n}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}>\varepsilon\right)â‰¤ âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_Îµ )
â‰¤(âˆ—)â€‹âˆ‘n=ns3â€‹nsexpâ¡(âˆ’Îµ2â€‹n2)\displaystyle\overset{(*)}{\leq}\sum_{n=n_{s}}^{3n_{s}}\exp\left(-\frac{\varepsilon^{2}n}{2}\right)start_OVERACCENT ( âˆ— ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG â‰¤ end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_Îµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG )

where (âˆ—)(*)( âˆ— ) follows from the following â„“2\ell_{2}roman_â„“ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-concentration of learning discrete distribution:

Lemma B.3 (Theorem 9 of Canonne [2020]).

Let ğ’®{\mathcal{S}}caligraphic_S be a finite state space, pâˆˆğ’«â€‹(ğ’®)p\in{\mathcal{P}}({\mathcal{S}})italic_p âˆˆ caligraphic_P ( caligraphic_S ), and Î´âˆˆ(0,1)\delta\in(0,1)italic_Î´ âˆˆ ( 0 , 1 ). We are given {si}iâˆˆ[N]\{s_{i}\}_{i\in[N]}{ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_N ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with siâ€‹âˆ¼i.i.d.â€‹ps_{i}\overset{i.i.d.}{\sim}pitalic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_OVERACCENT italic_i . italic_i . italic_d . end_OVERACCENT start_ARG âˆ¼ end_ARG italic_p. Let p^Nâˆˆğ’«â€‹(ğ’®)\hat{p}_{N}\in{\mathcal{P}}({\mathcal{S}})over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆˆ caligraphic_P ( caligraphic_S ) be defined as p^N(s):=1Nâˆ‘iâˆˆ[N]ğŸ™[si=s]\hat{p}_{N}(s)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i\in[N]}\mathds{1}[s_{i}=s]over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) : = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_N end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_N ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_s ] for each sâˆˆğ’®s\in{\mathcal{S}}italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S. Then, we have the following:

â„™â€‹(â€–pâˆ’p^Nâ€–2â‰¥Îµ)â‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’Îµ2â€‹N2),{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left\lVert p-\hat{p}_{N}\right\rVert_{2}\geq\varepsilon\right)\leq\exp\left(-\frac{\varepsilon^{2}N}{2}\right),blackboard_P ( âˆ¥ italic_p - over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¥ italic_Îµ ) â‰¤ roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_Îµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) , (22)

Lemma B.4 (Theorem 3.4 of Paulin [2015]).

Suppose of (Xh)hâ‰¥1(X_{h})_{h\geq 1}( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h â‰¥ 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is an ergodic Markov chain over ğ’®{\mathcal{S}}caligraphic_S with transition probability ppitalic_p, initial distribution Î¼\muitalic_Î¼, and pseudo spectral gap Î³ps\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Let Ï•âˆˆL2â€‹(Ï€)\phi\in L^{2}(\pi)italic_Ï• âˆˆ italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Ï€ ) with supsâˆˆğ’®|Ï•â€‹(s)âˆ’ğ”¼Ï€â€‹[Ï•]|â‰¤C\sup_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}|\phi(s)-\mathbb{E}_{\pi}[\phi]|\leq Croman_sup start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_Ï• ( italic_s ) - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_Ï• ] | â‰¤ italic_C for some C>0C>0italic_C > 0, and VÏ•:=VarÏ€[Ï•]V_{\phi}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\mathrm{Var}_{\pi}[\phi]italic_V start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï• end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = roman_Var start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_Ï• ]. Then, we have the following: for any uâ‰¥0u\geq 0italic_u â‰¥ 0,

â„™â€‹(âˆ‘h=1H(Ï•â€‹(Xh)âˆ’ğ”¼Ï€â€‹[Ï•â€‹(Xh)])â‰¥u)â‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’u2â€‹Î³ps8â€‹(H+1Î³ps)â€‹VÏ•+20â€‹Câ€‹u).{\mathbb{P}}\left(\sum_{h=1}^{H}(\phi(X_{h})-\mathbb{E}_{\pi}[\phi(X_{h})])\geq u\right)\leq\exp\left(-\frac{u^{2}\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}{8\left(H+\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\right)V_{\phi}+20Cu}\right).blackboard_P ( âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Ï• ( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_Ï• ( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ) â‰¥ italic_u ) â‰¤ roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_u start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 8 ( italic_H + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) italic_V start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï• end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 20 italic_C italic_u end_ARG ) . (23)

For two integers aâ‰¥ba\geq bitalic_a â‰¥ italic_b, denote âŸ¦a,bâŸ§:={a,a+1,â‹¯,b}\llbracket a,b\rrbracket\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\{a,a+1,\cdots,b\}âŸ¦ italic_a , italic_b âŸ§ : = { italic_a , italic_a + 1 , â‹¯ , italic_b }. We then have that

â„™Ï€â€‹(N^â€‹(s)âˆ‰âŸ¦Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)2,3â€‹Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)2âŸ§)\displaystyle{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\widehat{N}(s)\not\in\left\llbracket\frac{H\pi(s)}{2},\frac{3H\pi(s)}{2}\right\rrbracket\right)blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) âˆ‰ âŸ¦ divide start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG , divide start_ARG 3 italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âŸ§ ) =â„™Ï€â€‹(N^â€‹(s)âˆ’Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ‰âŸ¦âˆ’Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)2,Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)2âŸ§)\displaystyle={\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\widehat{N}(s)-H\pi(s)\not\in\left\llbracket-\frac{H\pi(s)}{2},\frac{H\pi(s)}{2}\right\rrbracket\right)= blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) - italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) âˆ‰ âŸ¦ - divide start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âŸ§ )
â‰¤â„™Ï€â€‹(|N^â€‹(s)âˆ’Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)|>Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)2)\displaystyle\leq{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left|\widehat{N}(s)-H\pi(s)\right|>\frac{H\pi(s)}{2}\right)â‰¤ blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( | over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) - italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) | > divide start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG )
â‰¤2â€‹expâ¡(âˆ’(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)/2)2â€‹Î³ps8â€‹(H+1Î³ps)â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))+20â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)/2))\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-\frac{(H\pi(s)/2)^{2}\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}{8\left(H+\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\right)\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))+20(H\pi(s)/2)}\right)â‰¤ 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) / 2 ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 8 ( italic_H + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) + 20 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) / 2 ) end_ARG )
â‰¤2â€‹expâ¡(âˆ’Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹Î³ps104).\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-\frac{H\pi(s)\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}{104}\right).â‰¤ 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 104 end_ARG ) . (Assume that H>1Î³psH>\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}italic_H > divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG)

Combining everything, we have that

â„™Ï€(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>Îµ)â‰¤(HÏ€(s)+1)exp(âˆ’Îµ2â€‹Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)2)+2exp(âˆ’Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹Î³ps104),{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\varepsilon\right)\leq(H\pi(s)+1)\exp\left(-\frac{\varepsilon^{2}H\pi(s)}{2}\right)+2\exp\left(-\frac{H\pi(s)\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}{104}\right),blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_Îµ ) â‰¤ ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_Îµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) + 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 104 end_ARG ) ,

and thus, with Hâ‰¥1Î³psâˆ¨104Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡2Î´H\geq\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\vee\frac{104}{\pi(s)\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{2}{\delta}italic_H â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ¨ divide start_ARG 104 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG, we have that

â„™Ï€(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>2Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹logâ¡2â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)+1)Î´)â‰¤Î´.{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\sqrt{\frac{2}{H\pi(s)}\log\frac{2(H\pi(s)+1)}{\delta}}\right)\leq\delta.blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG ) â‰¤ italic_Î´ . (24)

Here, we recall the following result that quantifies the price of non-stationarity due to the initial distribution Î¼\muitalic_Î¼ not necessarily being the stationary distribution Ï€\piitalic_Ï€:

Lemma B.5 (Proposition 3.10 of Paulin [2015]).

Let (X1,â‹¯,XH)(X_{1},\cdots,X_{H})( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â‹¯ , italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) be a (time-homogeneous) Markov chain with stationary distribution Ï€\piitalic_Ï€. For any measurable g:ğ’®Hâ†’â„g\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}{\mathcal{S}}^{H}\rightarrow{\mathbb{R}}italic_g : caligraphic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â†’ blackboard_R and initial distribution Î¼âˆˆÎ”â€‹(ğ’®)\mu\in\Delta({\mathcal{S}})italic_Î¼ âˆˆ roman_Î” ( caligraphic_S ), we have that for any uâ‰¥0u\geq 0italic_u â‰¥ 0,

â„™Î¼â€‹(gâ€‹(X1,â‹¯,XH)â‰¥u)â‰¤[âˆ‘sâˆˆğ’®Î¼â€‹(s)2Ï€â€‹(s)]â€‹â„™Ï€â€‹(gâ€‹(X1,â‹¯,XH)â‰¥u).{\mathbb{P}}_{\mu}\left(g(X_{1},\cdots,X_{H})\geq u\right)\leq\sqrt{\left[\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}\frac{\mu(s)^{2}}{\pi(s)}\right]{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(g(X_{1},\cdots,X_{H})\geq u\right)}.blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î¼ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_g ( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â‹¯ , italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¥ italic_u ) â‰¤ square-root start_ARG [ âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ ( italic_s ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG ] blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_g ( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â‹¯ , italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¥ italic_u ) end_ARG . (25)

Especially as |ğ’®|<âˆ|{\mathcal{S}}|<\infty| caligraphic_S | < âˆ, we can bound âˆ‘sâˆˆğ’®Î¼â€‹(s)2Ï€â€‹(s)â‰¤1Ï€min\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}\frac{\mu(s)^{2}}{\pi(s)}\leq\frac{1}{\pi_{\min}}âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s âˆˆ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ ( italic_s ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG â‰¤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG.

Thus,

â„™(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>2Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹logâ¡2â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)+1)Î´)â‰¤Î´Ï€min.{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\sqrt{\frac{2}{H\pi(s)}\log\frac{2(H\pi(s)+1)}{\delta}}\right)\leq\sqrt{\frac{\delta}{\pi_{\min}}}.blackboard_P ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG ) â‰¤ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG .

Reparametrizing finally gives

â„™(âˆ¥p(â‹…|s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s,â‹…)N^â€‹(s)âˆ¥2>2Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹logâ¡8â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)+1)Ï€minâ€‹Î´2)â‰¤Î´2,{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left\lVert p(\cdot|s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s,\cdot)}{\widehat{N}(s)}\right\rVert_{2}>\sqrt{\frac{2}{H\pi(s)}\log\frac{8(H\pi(s)+1)}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2},blackboard_P ( âˆ¥ italic_p ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s , â‹… ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG ) â‰¤ divide start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG , (26)

given that Hâ‰¥1Î³psâˆ¨104Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2H\geq\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\vee\frac{104}{\pi(s)\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}italic_H â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ¨ divide start_ARG 104 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG.

Bounding (iâ€‹i)(ii)( italic_i italic_i ). Note that

|Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s)H|=|Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s)H|Ï€â€‹(s)+N^â€‹(s)Hâ‰¤1Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹|Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s)H|.\left|\sqrt{\pi(s)}-\sqrt{\frac{\widehat{N}(s)}{H}}\right|=\frac{\left|\pi(s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s)}{H}\right|}{\sqrt{\pi(s)}+\sqrt{\frac{\widehat{N}(s)}{H}}}\leq\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi(s)}}\left|\pi(s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s)}{H}\right|.| square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG end_ARG | = divide start_ARG | italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG | end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG + square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG end_ARG end_ARG â‰¤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG | italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG | .

Again, we invoke LemmaÂ B.4:

â„™Ï€â€‹(|Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s)H|>32â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))Hâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2)\displaystyle{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left|\pi(s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s)}{H}\right|>\sqrt{\frac{32\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}\right)blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ï€ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( | italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG | > square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 32 italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG )
â‰¤2â€‹expâ¡(âˆ’32â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))â€‹Hâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´28â€‹(H+1Î³ps)â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))+20â€‹32â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))â€‹HÎ³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î³ps)\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-\frac{32\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))H\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}{8\left(H+\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\right)\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))+20\sqrt{\frac{32\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}}}\right)â‰¤ 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG 32 italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) italic_H roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG 8 ( italic_H + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) + 20 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 32 italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG end_ARG )
â‰¤2â€‹expâ¡(âˆ’2â€‹Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))â€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))+5â€‹2Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2)\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-\frac{2\sqrt{H\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}{\sqrt{H\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))}+5\sqrt{\frac{2}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}}\right)â‰¤ 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG 2 square-root start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG + 5 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG end_ARG ) (Hâ‰¥1Î³psH\geq\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}italic_H â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG)
â‰¤2â€‹expâ¡(âˆ’2â€‹Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))â€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´22â€‹Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s)))\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-\frac{2\sqrt{H\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}{2\sqrt{H\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))}}\right)â‰¤ 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG 2 square-root start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG 2 square-root start_ARG italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG end_ARG ) (Hâ‰¥50Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))â€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2H\geq\frac{50}{\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}italic_H â‰¥ divide start_ARG 50 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG)
=Ï€minâ€‹Î´24.\displaystyle=\frac{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}{4}.= divide start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG .

Using LemmaÂ B.5, we then have

â„™â€‹(|Ï€â€‹(s)âˆ’N^â€‹(s)H|>32â€‹Ï€â€‹(s)â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))Hâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2)â‰¤Î´2.{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left|\pi(s)-\frac{\widehat{N}(s)}{H}\right|>\sqrt{\frac{32\pi(s)(1-\pi(s))}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}.blackboard_P ( | italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) - divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG | > square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 32 italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG ) â‰¤ divide start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG . (27)

Combining everything. By union bound, we have that with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1-\delta1 - italic_Î´,

âˆ¥Ï€(fâ€‹(t))â€‹(s)p(fâ€‹(t))(â‹…|s)âˆ’1Hâ€‹N^tâ€‹(s)N^t(s,â‹…)âˆ¥2\displaystyle\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(f(t))}(s)}p^{(f(t))}(\cdot|s)-\frac{1}{\sqrt{H\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,\cdot)\right\rVert_{2}âˆ¥ square-root start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( â‹… | italic_s ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_H over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , â‹… ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
â‰¤2Hâ€‹logâ¡8â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)+1)Ï€minâ€‹Î´2+32â€‹(1âˆ’Ï€â€‹(s))Hâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8Ï€minâ€‹Î´2\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{\frac{2}{H}\log\frac{8(H\pi(s)+1)}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}+\sqrt{\frac{32(1-\pi(s))}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}â‰¤ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG + square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 32 ( 1 - italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG
â‰¤4â€‹2Hâ€‹Î³psâ€‹logâ¡8â€‹(Hâ€‹Ï€â€‹(s)+1)Ï€minâ€‹Î´2.\displaystyle\leq 4\sqrt{\frac{2}{H\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{8(H\pi(s)+1)}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}.â‰¤ 4 square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_H italic_Î³ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 8 ( italic_H italic_Ï€ ( italic_s ) + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï€ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î´ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG . (28)

âˆ

B.2 Proof of LemmaÂ B.2

Here, we are largely inspired by the proof strategies of Yun and ProutiÃ¨re [2014a, Appendix C] and Yun and ProutiÃ¨re [2016, Appendix C.2].

We start by defining the following sets:

â„k\displaystyle{\mathcal{I}}_{k}caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT :={tâˆˆfâˆ’1(k):âˆ¥ğ’€^t,:âˆ’ğ‘¾t,:âˆ¥22â‰¤14(r^)2logTâ€‹HÎ´},kâˆˆ[K]\displaystyle\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\left\{t\in f^{-1}(k)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{Y}}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}-{\bm{W}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}\leq\frac{1}{4}(\widehat{r})^{2}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}\right\},\quad k\in[K]: = { italic_t âˆˆ italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) : âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_Y end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG ( over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG } , italic_k âˆˆ [ italic_K ] (29)
ğ’ª\displaystyle{\mathcal{O}}caligraphic_O :={tâˆˆ[T]:mintâ€²âˆˆ[T]âˆ¥ğ’€^t,:âˆ’ğ‘¾tâ€²,:âˆ¥22â‰¥4(r^)2logTâ€‹HÎ´}.\displaystyle\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\left\{t\in[T]\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}\min_{t^{\prime}\in[T]}\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{Y}}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}-{\bm{W}}_{t^{\prime},\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}\geq 4(\widehat{r})^{2}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}\right\}.: = { italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] : roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆˆ [ italic_T ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_Y end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥ 4 ( over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG } . (30)

Intuitively, â„k{\mathcal{I}}_{k}caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is the subset of trajectories of fâˆ’1â€‹(k)f^{-1}(k)italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) that will be classified accurately (with high probability), and ğ’ª{\mathcal{O}}caligraphic_O is the set of trajectories that are clustered at the end (i.e., lines 12-13).

Then the following properties hold:

    (â‹ƒk=1Kâ„k)âˆ©ğ’¬t=âˆ…\left(\bigcup_{k=1}^{K}{\mathcal{I}}_{k}\right)\cap{\mathcal{Q}}_{t}=\emptyset( â‹ƒ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ© caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = âˆ… for any tâˆˆğ’ªt\in{\mathcal{O}}italic_t âˆˆ caligraphic_O.     =74â€‹(r^)2â€‹logâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´â‰¥(r^)2â€‹logâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´,\displaystyle=\frac{7}{4}(\widehat{r})^{2}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}\geq(\widehat{r})^{2}\log\frac{TH}{\delta},= divide start_ARG 7 end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG ( over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG â‰¥ ( over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG ,

    i.e., tâ€²âˆˆğ’¬tâ‡’tâ€²âˆ‰â‹ƒk=1Ksâ„kt^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{Q}}_{t}\Rightarrow t^{\prime}\not\in\bigcup_{k=1}^{K_{s}}{\mathcal{I}}_{k}italic_t start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆˆ caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‡’ italic_t start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â€² end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ‰ â‹ƒ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

    |[T]âˆ–âˆªk=1Kâ„k|â‰¤Râ€‹Tlogâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´\left|[T]\setminus\cup_{k=1}^{K}{\mathcal{I}}_{k}\right|\leq\frac{RT}{\log\frac{TH}{\delta}}| [ italic_T ] âˆ– âˆª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | â‰¤ divide start_ARG italic_R italic_T end_ARG start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG.     |[T]âˆ–âˆªk=1Kâ„k|â‰¤â€–ğ’€^âˆ’ğ‘¾â€–F2mintâˆˆ[T]âˆ–â£âˆªk=1Kâ„kâ¡â€–ğ’€^t,:âˆ’ğ‘¾t,:â€–22â‰¤8â€‹Râ€‹Tâ€‹(r^)214â€‹(r^)2â€‹logâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´=32â€‹Râ€‹Tlogâ¡Tâ€‹HÎ´\left|[T]\setminus\cup_{k=1}^{K}{\mathcal{I}}_{k}\right|\leq\frac{\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{Y}}}-{\bm{W}}\right\rVert_{F}^{2}}{\min_{t\in[T]\setminus\cup_{k=1}^{K}{\mathcal{I}}_{k}}\left\lVert\widehat{{\bm{Y}}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}-{\bm{W}}_{t,\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}}\right\rVert_{2}^{2}}\leq\frac{8RT(\widehat{r})^{2}}{\frac{1}{4}(\widehat{r})^{2}\log\frac{TH}{\delta}}=\frac{32RT}{\log\frac{TH}{\delta}}| [ italic_T ] âˆ– âˆª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | â‰¤ divide start_ARG âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_Y end_ARG - bold_italic_W âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t âˆˆ [ italic_T ] âˆ– âˆª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_Y end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG â‰¤ divide start_ARG 8 italic_R italic_T ( over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG ( over^ start_ARG italic_r end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG = divide start_ARG 32 italic_R italic_T end_ARG start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_T italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î´ end_ARG end_ARG
  • (iii)

    â„kâŠ†ğ’¬t{\mathcal{I}}_{k}\subseteq{\mathcal{Q}}_{t}caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âŠ† caligraphic_Q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for any tâˆˆâ„kt\in{\mathcal{I}}_{k}italic_t âˆˆ caligraphic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.
